Reviews.Title: i would've given it a 5 star rating, but...
Reviews.Author: @thetwistednerv
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is nice. It's just what I needed, a high-end, non-cam phone. I have spent some time searching for a phone like this that I can use for work. I'm happy I was able to find this at Amazon.PROs:-The phone is really fast and responsive.-The QWERTY keypad is also big enough (even for my big fingers) and it's surprisingly soft to press.-The screen's resolution is just amazing.-The touch+type combo works perfectly well. I'd recommend it for web browsing.-I don't have any problems connecting it to my PC for file transfers and updates.-I'm in south east asia; the phone works well. International connectivity is reliable.-Lastly, IT REALLY IS A NON CAM PHONE. =)CONs:-It does have minor cosmetics issues though. The phone had some scratches. It had a power adapter; however, it's not the usual USB cable + ac charger. So, no USB cable; no earphones too. No biggie though. For the price tag, I'm certainly fine with it.-When I first used it, I was getting a message saying [Activation Required] at the top of the home screen. I guess the phone that I got wasn't unlocked. I had to pay a technician to have it unlocked for me to fully use the phone's features.I would still recommend this phone. I am sort of reluctant to get another one, though. Based on other customer reviews, these phones could be refurb'd ones, and not brand new. Oh well, fortunately, the phone that I got is a good find.

Reviews.Title: Why do I have to Activate? This is misleading
Reviews.Author: Courtney Chen
Reviews.Content: I bough this phone unlocked new to use overseas. The phone works perfectly for answering and receiving calls. Here in Jamaica I cannot use my browser and also unable to use the internet? is this right?  the description says UNLOCKED, please inform me on what to do!

Reviews.Title: Excellent item
Reviews.Author: Ahmad Al Fahad
Reviews.Content: the mobile phone is excellent i spent  my time for searching for mobile without camera finally i got it , the shipment is excellent within the shipment date iam so happy with my new phone with full keyboard for texting and chatting as well .many thanks

Reviews.Title: BLUTEKUSA seller: This phone is NOT unlocked and BIS does not work
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: I have had a similar experience to another reviewer here: The phone is able to make calls and send sms, but data services (including Blackberry Internet Service, BIS) can NEVER work.This is because the phones are Verizon branded and have had a previous owner. Verizon will not release the BIS or IMEI numbers for the phone unless the original owner is contacted first. Of course, this is impossible if you are buying from Amazon.AVOID, AVOID, AVOID. Trust me, I learned the hard way.Note, this is for the Bold 9930 sold by BLUTEKUSA (and fulfilled by Amazon---thanks Amazon!!! \s). The phone itself is great, but you may as well get one of the new Blackberrys with the 10 operating system.This is definitely not the deal it seems.

Reviews.Title: This phone suck
Reviews.Author: amir hegazi
Reviews.Content: This is only the 2nd review I ever wrote and that's because either the buyer sold me a defective version (even though was wrapped like new) or this phone suck (doesn't turn off, ball in the middle doesn't move). I paid $250 on a device that's worthless. Blackberry used to be awesome and lately they've been getting worse and worse and more unreliable.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT Buy this device
Reviews.Author: Rajeev Ranjan
Reviews.Content: Strongly advise NOT TO BUY this device. This device looks good at first look. Problem starts one-by-one once you start using it right from day one. Listing couple of grave problems I faced:Battery is weak and sometimes would not last even half a dayCalls drop and device restarts on its ownSometimes you will not be able to hear voice of other person.. When this happens you will have to pull your battery and restart device. Just imagine the frustration of other side screaming Hello.. hello..After 6 months of use, device would be ON but nothing visible on screen as if its dead..although you will receive incoming calls but you wont be able to tell who is calling. Wait for 15 minutes and all will be ok.Again re-iterating DO NOT BUY this device. Note that its not covered under any warranty.

Reviews.Title: not exactly what they told me.
Reviews.Author: mariana
Reviews.Content: Well the phone is awsome. But i was told that it would work under my tmobile service lie it didnt work the enternet was not working, neither was my MMS. The batterys sticker was red meaning that the phone was probably in contact with water at some point but ikept it anyways because the device was working fine with my calls and text. After few months of using it i want to say around 5 months the phone stated being very slow i mean really slow. I would reset the device constantly and it would work again but later it would slow down. The device also freezes allll the time and i have to be taking the battery on and off wich gets really annoying because i have a hard cover on it and those are very hard to take off every time the device decides to freeze. Another problem is that sometimes when i want to scroll thru my text messages history it wont let me ugh! Well enough said i DO not recommend buying this device at all.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to use it on location since it's not allowed to carry a camera phone. transaction was smooth and phone cam in new condition.NOTE: don't try to activate the phone in usa, It's still registered to Verizon but overseas it works right away .. it's yes it's International UNLOCKED phone but not in within the USA

Reviews.Title: Camera version???
Reviews.Author: Maninder Jit Singh
Reviews.Content: The phone that I received is a camera version. The back of the phone is not what is looks like in the description/ pictures uploaded, and you can clearly see the camera and flash opening. Unfortunately, my company does not allow these phones, even if the camera was physically removed. I got this ordered to a friend in the US who brought it for me to India. Now I cannnot even return it back. It is useless for me. First-time bad experience with Amazon.Update 02/22/2013: So I somehow managed to return it back as another friend was visiting the US. I ordered another one and this time received a true non-camera version! But........ the phone is dead... It won't charge. There is something wrong with the lot that the seller is trying to supply. I am now having doubts if these are new or old.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Mohsin Murad
Reviews.Content: I needed a smartphone with all the features except for the camera which I got from this and that too at a reasonable price.I would have given a 5 start rating but since there was no accessories so I am giving 4 Star.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my Exspectaiions
Reviews.Author: Milton B..Hibbler "Milton B. Hibbler"
Reviews.Content: This phone arrived in nearly perfect mint conditionI slide my Att sim in powered cycled made a few changes in setting and she was ready to go !This purchase literally saved me at least 2 to 3 hundred dollars

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we needed
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: We needed a non-camera phone and this works well for us.  One of the best blackberry I've uses ever.  Although I'm pretty used to using the touchpad and qwerty keyboard on blackberrys, the touch feature is a good addition.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: saleh
Reviews.Content: The device is what I want, it was shipped in less than two days which is good. thanks Cheers

Reviews.Title: THE BLACKBERRY 9930 IS BRILLIANT.
Reviews.Author: Craig Marco Polo
Reviews.Content: I bought three unlocked smartphones (on Amazon) to use and evaluate:  Samsung Galaxy 4, Nokia 920, and Blackberry 9930.  After six months experience, here are my thoughts.I have relied heavily on my PC and a dumb cell phone for more than 20 years, but I finally decided to get a smartphone.As a user I like the Samsung least in terms of its user interface and focus on advertising stuff.  The Nokia 920 has a brilliant screen and the best graphics for games and movies.  But as a communicator, the BB 9930 is the best!To quote a line from the movie Star Wars regarding the Millennium Falcon, "it's got it where it counts".  If your focus for a phone is (1) phone calls, (2), SMS, and (3) email, then Blackberry is the best.  Virtually no advertising fluff is imposed on the user.  I have not personally owned the BB Q10 or Z10, but based on my study of published user reviews, it's clear that the BB 9900/9930 is preferred by many BB users.As I said, I wanted a phone, first and foremost.  However, you might be interested to know that it is also a brilliant MP3 player.Sorry this posting is so long, but I hope some readers find it helpful.P. S.  My service provider is Telna, which I have used for years.  Their pay-as-you-go, no-subscription-contract (for voice, SMS, and data) is brilliantly cost-effective!  Their GSM sim card interfaces perfectly in the Blackberry 9900/9930.P. P. S.  I read the reviews of some users who have encountered SETUP PROBLEMS.  As I said above, I have an unlocked Blackberry 9930, an unlocked Nokia 920 and an unlocked Samsung Galaxy 4, all purchased from Amazon.  Please be aware that all unlocked phones have setup challenges that will be  "learning curve" for the new buyer.  Here is some help for the BB 9930/9900.I believe most of my comments below would apply to 9900, but please be aware that the 9900 does not support CDMA; the 9930 is both GSM and CDMA capable.If you are getting the "ACTIVATION REQUIRED" message at the top of a Verizon BB 9930 that is supposed to unlocked, the message is misleading.  I eliminated this message as follows.There is a CDMA screen for the 9930.  You can access it by dialing ##000000 from your Blackberry 9930, which will take you to the "CDMA Service Edit Screen", where you can edit some settings.Edit the "Mobile Directory Number" there (it may be blank or the some vestigial Verizon phone number) and enter your phone number that you are using with your SIM card.  This eliminates the "Activation Required" heading at the top.  Be careful not to change anything else on this screen.INTERNET BROWSING is accomplished as follows.  First, you must specify your APN for your service provider.  My service provider is Telna, and their service is very cost competitive and works very well with the BB 9930.  Goto to 'Options' on the Home screen.  Goto to 'Device'.  Goto to 'Advanced System Settings'.  Goto to 'TCP IP'.  Enable "APN Settings".  Specify "APN: " with the URL from your service provider.  In my case I did not check "APN Authentication Enabled:".  You probably should leave blank "Username for APN:" and "password for APN:"Browsing the internet works quite well as follows:  (1) Use the native BB browser for web access via wifi; the BB browser will refuse to connect over GSM.  (2) Use Opera Mini for web access over GSM; Opera Mini will refuse to connect over wifi.  Install app "Opera Mini" as a browser using "Blackberry World".  Note, you must be connected by wifi to use "Blackberry World".  Search for and install "Opera Mini".  (3)  To minimize data charges, I keep "Data Services" turned off.  I turn it on only when I want Opera Mini to use GSM, and incur data charges.  From the Home screen, goto "Manage Connections", "Network and Connections", "Mobile Network", and adjust the setting for "Data Services".BLACKBERRY 9930 MANUALThe online manual is excellent.  Search forBlackberry 9930 "User Guide" .If you read this far, I hope it was helpful.BTW, I am not affiliated with Blackberry or any phone manufacturer or service provider.

Reviews.Title: Phone just doesn't work
Reviews.Author: mll
Reviews.Content: Screen doesn't scroll, won't connect to the internet, Blackberry doesn't recognize the IMEI and told me it was a "fake Blackberry".

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Nvm
Reviews.Content: The phone didn't work. It wouldn't turn on. I tried changing the battery and its charger but stilI got no luck. So I contacted the seller, and asked what to do with it and never got any response. Waste of money!!

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: bashir
Reviews.Content: Unannounced, there is no place where it was written that the phone has no camera when buying it until the phone arrived I saw it. Was shocked

Reviews.Title: NOT SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: maria alejandra cedeño
Reviews.Content: BRINGS NO CAMERA, BROUGHT ME PROBLEM WITH THE SCREEN AND THAT LOAD PING VALE OVERSEAS PURCHASE IF YOU WILL LIKE TO USE AS.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone, but not the best
Reviews.Author: Jaggu
Reviews.Content: BB Bold 9930 is very useful, only because camera phone are not allowed in most of the IT Offices now-a-days!If camera phone are allowed, then we probably have better phone in the same category!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: RichardB
Reviews.Content: I work in a secured environment and so needed a smart phone with no camera which is harder to find than it sounds. I Received the phone in a very timely manner, had no issues activating it on my service provider here in the UAE and the minor issue that I  did have with the 'Activation Required' message I was getting on the home screen was fixed quickly and simply with an email to customer service.This device is perfect for my needs and I have gone on to recommend this model and seller to a number of colleagues, some of whom had already purchased from other sellers only to be sent phones with cameras!

Reviews.Title: review for 9930
Reviews.Author: DumbHaha
Reviews.Content: it wasnt bad when i first received it.. but the initial sight was rather disappointing as the box looks really worn out.. there were some scratches on the phone as well. but after using for 2weeks plus it was within my expectation

Reviews.Title: Phone delivered but disappointed!
Reviews.Author: samhds
Reviews.Content: This phone is what I wanted, non camera, touch screen. Great phone. However the process of me buying it was an unpleasant one.Ordered 2 sets about a month ago. Upon receiving it, one of the set LCD screen was spoilt, while the other is working well. Therefore I have my doubts whether these are brand new sets or refurbish ones, there are minor cosmetic damages as well. Given the price, I would not mind any cosmetic damages, however, really disappointed that one of the sets LCD screen could not be used at all, the whole screen was flicking. Sent one back to Amazon, now awaiting for the refund, definitely would love to purchase the phone again, just afraid of the quality control that comes out from the seller!

Reviews.Title: Connected, perfectly
Reviews.Author: I. Shelley "Air_Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: Received phone quickly, and within 20 minutes I was up and running! Even though Blackberry is a bit behind the times in other areas, the international reliability is unmatched.

Reviews.Title: mobil excellent for this price.
Reviews.Author: alfredo
Reviews.Content: mobil excellent for this price. My wife is not happy because the mobil a whole has no camera, when you make the purchase I did not notice this detail, however the mobile meets all its functions. mobil is a good team. recommend

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Kino
Reviews.Content: Great, good phone, fast delivery very good. aha..touch screen and alll that.. just that its hard to debrand.. hmm need more battery though, runs out quickly

Reviews.Title: Blackberry  bold 9930
Reviews.Author: ALMARZOUQI16
Reviews.Content: Thanks great product as per the details thanks for this item I was searching for phone with no cams nice pin code number it's original from rim company thanks a lot recommended 5star VIP

Reviews.Title: bueno
Reviews.Author: Nahir Garcia
Reviews.Content: exelente producto gracias lo recomiendo todo lo que dice el vendedor es cierto vale la pena comprar recomendado exeente .

Reviews.Title: The phone malfunctions
Reviews.Author: Jc
Reviews.Content: The phone just malfunctions. When someone calls we do not hear the person speaking , when we try to call someone they cant hear us. Had great expectations on this phone. PLESE REPLACE OR RETURN MY MONEY
